question: Can my wife take this injection by a male doctor to reduce the labour pain
answer:
QUESTION
I have a question for you. My wife is pregnant and Inshallah she will be delivering a baby sometime later . It seems that, at the time ofÂ  delivery the doctors give an injection in the backbone to reduce the labour pains, which is generally given by male doctors. Can my wife take this injection by a male doctor to reduce the labour pain, though the doctor for the delivery process (Obs & Gynecologist) will be a female
ANSWER


Share:

It is permissible for a female to take the injection to reduce labour pain from a male doctor.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
